question_text: Which condition may still present an electrocution risk **even when the PC is unplugged**?
answer_options: The CMOS battery is left connected
The power switch on the PSU is left ON
High-voltage capacitors inside the PSU are charged
correct_answer: High-voltage capacitors inside the PSU are charged
explanation: Charged capacitors store energy that can discharge through human contact, even if the PC is unplugged.
